entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
